# SEQ27 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 27 focuses on fine tune the shape and size of rooms and alcoves

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl190, apl191, apl192, apl193, apl194, apl195, apl196

## Emergent Phenomena
Rooms shaped and sized to support their specific functions and create comfort

## Overview
This sequence contains 7 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
